scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc --project tsconfig.prod.json && npm run build:post && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: mkdir -p public/frontend && cp -r dist/frontend/* public/frontend/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build:post: mkdir -p dist/app dist/frontend dist/controllers dist/services dist/config dist/types dist/utils dist/models && cp -r dist/src/app/* dist/app/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r dist/src/frontend/* dist/frontend/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r dist/src/controllers/* dist/controllers/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r dist/src/services/* dist/services/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r dist/src/config/* dist/config/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r dist/src/types/* dist/types/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r dist/src/utils/* dist/utils/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r dist/src/models/* dist/models/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run build
